name: colab-code-editor
description: A scalable, real-time collaborative coding platform that enables multiple users to work simultaneously within a shared development environment. The system leverages cloud-native architecture and is built using services from AWS to ensure reliability, scalability, and performance.

name: ICSK_Student_Shuffler
description: A GUI-based application that enables teachers to automate the student class assignment process. The system imports student data from Excel spreadsheets and distributes students into separate classes using a randomized algorithm that maintains uniformity across class characteristics.

name: Runtime_SBOM_Generator
description: A script that generates SBOM for a project that will capture dynamically invoked libraries using Linux strace calls.

name: Swiper-No-Swiping
description: A chrome extension that can be used for identifying PIIs (Personally Identifiable Information) in sensitive documents before uploading onto an AI platform
